Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Shoo \Shoo\, interj. [Cf. G. scheuchen to scare, drive away.] Begone; away; -- an expression used in frightening away animals, especially fowls. [1913 Webster] [Webster 1913 Suppl.]
shoo v : drive away by crying `shoo!' [syn: {shoo off}, {shoo away}]
